__e: I dreamt I was dead and I could look back on everything I'd done.
I dreamt I was back home with the missus, and I'm sitting in the kitchen next to her...
I can't tell you how many times I dreamed I was in bed here with you when I was... you know.
I dreamt I was back home with the missus, and I'm sitting in the kitchen next to her...
I had a dream that I'd go to a place where I could eat all I want and now I'm here!
I dream I will be the head of state... and the most highest head of state in the world... when I was just none...
This is the limit. You haven't decorated the car yet.
If I don't... my whole life I've dreamt of one thing.
There's a city that I dreamed of Very far from here Very, very far away from here
All my life I dreamed about tossing the pigskin around
I've dreamed of the day I'd make you pay for the death of my brother!
Last night I dreamed the end of one history... and the beginning of another.
I dreamed about my mom once but I don't remember her face. I don't understand.
It was just at the challenge they saw her, and I did dream every single day out here what I could do for my family and it...
That was when I dreamt about you for the first time.
I was your wife for a year and a half..., and still I never dreamt about you, not once.
Have I ever told you I dreamt about you - when I was like 10 years old?
